ayahs.text: [{"word_arabic":"وَحَمَلْنَاهُ","word_ayah":13,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":68278,"word_number_in_surah":82,"word_translation":"And We carried him","word_transliteration":"wahamalnahu"},{"word_arabic":"عَلَى","word_ayah":13,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":68279,"word_number_in_surah":83,"word_translation":"on","word_transliteration":"ala"},{"word_arabic":"ذَاتِ","word_ayah":13,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":68280,"word_number_in_surah":84,"word_translation":"(ark) made of planks","word_transliteration":"dhati"},{"word_arabic":"أَلْوَاحٍ","word_ayah":13,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":68281,"word_number_in_surah":85,"word_translation":"(ark) made of planks","word_transliteration":"alwahin"},{"word_arabic":"وَدُسُرٍ","word_ayah":13,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":68282,"word_number_in_surah":86,"word_translation":"and nails","word_transliteration":"wadusurin"}]

[{"word_arabic":"فَقَالُوا","word_ayah":24,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":68341,"word_number_in_surah":145,"word_translation":"And said","word_transliteration":"faqalu"},{"word_arabic":"أَبَشَرًا","word_ayah":24,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":68342,"word_number_in_surah":146,"word_translation":"Is (it) a human being","word_transliteration":"abasharan"},{"word_arabic":"مِّنَّا","word_ayah":24,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":68343,"word_number_in_surah":147,"word_translation":"among us","word_transliteration":"minna"},{"word_arabic":"وَاحِدًا","word_ayah":24,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":68344,"word_number_in_surah":148,"word_translation":"one","word_transliteration":"wahidan"},{"word_arabic":"نَّتَّبِعُهُ","word_ayah":24,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":68345,"word_number_in_surah":149,"word_translation":"(that) we should follow him","word_transliteration":"nattabi'uhu"},{"word_arabic":"إِنَّا","word_ayah":24,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":68346,"word_number_in_surah":150,"word_translation":"Indeed we","word_transliteration":"inna"},{"word_arabic":"إِذًا","word_ayah":24,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":68347,"word_number_in_surah":151,"word_translation":"then","word_transliteration":"idhan"},{"word_arabic":"لَّفِي","word_ayah":24,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":68348,"word_number_in_surah":152,"word_translation":"(will be) surely in","word_transliteration":"lafi"},{"word_arabic":"ضَلَالٍ","word_ayah":24,"word_number_in_ayah":9,"word_number_in_quran":68349,"word_number_in_surah":153,"word_translation":"error","word_transliteration":"dalalin"},{"word_arabic":"وَسُعُرٍ","word_ayah":24,"word_number_in_ayah":10,"word_number_in_quran":68350,"word_number_in_surah":154,"word_translation":"and madness","word_transliteration":"wasu'urin"}]

[{"word_arabic":"إِنَّا","word_ayah":31,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":68388,"word_number_in_surah":192,"word_translation":"Indeed We","word_transliteration":"inna"},{"word_arabic":"أَرْسَلْنَا","word_ayah":31,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":68389,"word_number_in_surah":193,"word_translation":"[We] sent","word_transliteration":"arsalna"},{"word_arabic":"عَلَيْهِمْ","word_ayah":31,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":68390,"word_number_in_surah":194,"word_translation":"upon them","word_transliteration":"alayhim"},{"word_arabic":"صَيْحَةً","word_ayah":31,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":68391,"word_number_in_surah":195,"word_translation":"thunderous blast","word_transliteration":"sayhatan"},{"word_arabic":"وَاحِدَةً","word_ayah":31,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":68392,"word_number_in_surah":196,"word_translation":"single","word_transliteration":"wahidatan"},{"word_arabic":"فَكَانُوا","word_ayah":31,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":68393,"word_number_in_surah":197,"word_translation":"and they became","word_transliteration":"fakanu"},{"word_arabic":"كَهَشِيمِ","word_ayah":31,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":68394,"word_number_in_surah":198,"word_translation":"like dry twig fragments","word_transliteration":"kahashimi"},{"word_arabic":"الْمُحْتَظِرِ","word_ayah":31,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":68395,"word_number_in_surah":199,"word_translation":"(used by) a fence builder","word_transliteration":"al-muh'taziri"}]

[{"word_arabic":"وَلَقَدْ","word_ayah":37,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":68428,"word_number_in_surah":232,"word_translation":"And certainly","word_transliteration":"walaqad"},{"word_arabic":"رَاوَدُوهُ","word_ayah":37,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":68429,"word_number_in_surah":233,"word_translation":"they demanded from him","word_transliteration":"rawaduhu"},{"word_arabic":"عَن","word_ayah":37,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":68430,"word_number_in_surah":234,"word_translation":"they demanded from him","word_transliteration":"an"},{"word_arabic":"ضَيْفِهِ","word_ayah":37,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":68431,"word_number_in_surah":235,"word_translation":"his guests","word_transliteration":"dayfihi"},{"word_arabic":"فَطَمَسْنَا","word_ayah":37,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":68432,"word_number_in_surah":236,"word_translation":"so We blinded","word_transliteration":"fatamasna"},{"word_arabic":"أَعْيُنَهُمْ","word_ayah":37,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":68433,"word_number_in_surah":237,"word_translation":"their eyes","word_transliteration":"a'yunahum"},{"word_arabic":"فَذُوقُوا","word_ayah":37,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":68434,"word_number_in_surah":238,"word_translation":"So taste","word_transliteration":"fadhuqu"},{"word_arabic":"عَذَابِي","word_ayah":37,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":68435,"word_number_in_surah":239,"word_translation":"My punishment","word_transliteration":"adhabi"},{"word_arabic":"وَنُذُرِ","word_ayah":37,"word_number_in_ayah":9,"word_number_in_quran":68436,"word_number_in_surah":240,"word_translation":"and My warnings","word_transliteration":"wanudhuri"}]

[{"word_arabic":"بَلِ","word_ayah":46,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":68482,"word_number_in_surah":286,"word_translation":"Nay","word_transliteration":"bali"},{"word_arabic":"السَّاعَةُ","word_ayah":46,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":68483,"word_number_in_surah":287,"word_translation":"the Hour","word_transliteration":"al-sa'atu"},{"word_arabic":"مَوْعِدُهُمْ","word_ayah":46,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":68484,"word_number_in_surah":288,"word_translation":"(is) their promised time","word_transliteration":"maw'iduhum"},{"word_arabic":"وَالسَّاعَةُ","word_ayah":46,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":68485,"word_number_in_surah":289,"word_translation":"and the Hour","word_transliteration":"wal-sa'atu"},{"word_arabic":"أَدْهَى","word_ayah":46,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":68486,"word_number_in_surah":290,"word_translation":"(will be) more grievous","word_transliteration":"adha"},{"word_arabic":"وَأَمَرُّ","word_ayah":46,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":68487,"word_number_in_surah":291,"word_translation":"and more bitter","word_transliteration":"wa-amarru"}]
